text: Little Schoharie Creek converges with the Schoharie Creek in Middleburgh, New York. ==Hydrology== ===Discharge=== The United States Geological Survey (USGS) maintains stream gauges along Little Schoharie Creek. The station by Middleburgh in operation since December 2017, upstream from the mouth, had a maximum discharge of per second on April 16, 2018, and a minimum discharge of per second on July 21, 2018. == References == Category:Rivers of New York (state)
title: Little Schoharie Creek
